titles.title: Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 201 (Roll no. 115).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/5/2004--Passed Senate without amendment. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from April 2, 2004, until April 20, 2004, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from April 7, 8, or 9, 2004, until April 19, 2004.
